settings.heading: more info/grade
settings.content:
Info:

  • Ideal for both start sellers and advanced resellers.
  • Diversify your inventory.
  • Range of timeless pieces; from sweatshirts and hoodies to jackets, fleeces, and coats.

Sizing:

Mixed Mens & Womens (XS-XXXL)

Grade:

A/B MIX

Items may contain: marks, small tears, damaged zippers and linings, distressing etc.

Disclaimer:

The products displayed in the listing video will be the exact items you will receive. While we aim for accuracy in our product representations, please note that minor variations in colour, texture, or condition may occur due to factors such as lighting and screen settings. Each item has been hand graded by our team for quality assurance. If you have any questions, concerns, or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to our customer support team.

settings.heading: delivery
settings.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout

settings.title: MARKO DI COSTA
settings.description: By far the best sack I have had from a wholesaler in the UK. I’ve had so many of them but all warned me away from Bulk but all I can say is their stock is the best and all the other wholesales are jealous

settings.title: gabriel rylkabreak vintag
settings.description: Really great service from Bulk. 100% be returning to these guys!
